response.text: Available commands:
HELP or H - Show this help
LOOK or L - Look around
INVENTORY or I - Check your items
NORTH/N, SOUTH/S, EAST/E, WEST/W - Move
You are standing on a dark street corner. Halloween
decorations sway in the autumn breeze. Jack-o'-lanterns
grin from nearby porches. You can go NORTH to the
mansion, EAST or WEST down the street.
You are carrying:
- A canvas trick-or-treat bag (3 treats)
- A plastic sword
- A flashlight (on)
- Fake vampire teeth
You approach the iron gate. It's locked tight.
The Victorian mansion looms behind it, dark and
foreboding.
You head back down the street toward where you
started your trick-or-treating adventure.
You walk east down Elm Street. More houses with
glowing windows line the sidewalk. The wind picks
up, rustling the fallen leaves.
You head west. The streetlights cast long shadows
as you walk. You can smell woodsmoke from nearby
chimneys.
